home.description: Full Stack Developer passionate about creating innovative technological solutions, with experience in modern architectures and performance optimization
home.aboutDescription: I'm a full stack developer with over 3 years of experience creating modern web and mobile applications. I specialize in React, Next.js, Node.js and cloud technologies. I'm passionate about solving complex problems and turning ideas into digital products that positively impact people.

python.title: Databases and SQL for Data Science with Python
python.description: Design and management of relational databases, writing advanced SQL queries for extraction | Data transformation and analysis | Integration with Python (libraries like Pandas and SQLAlchemy) for ETL flow automation | Data visualization and dataset cleaning | Optimization of structures and queries to support predictive models and scalable solutions in analytical environments.

odoo.title: Odoo 16/17 Technical Course
odoo.description: Odoo implementation in Ubuntu environments | Development of custom modules, widgets and advanced business logic | Python integration for data import and translation | Optimize ERP processes | Consolidated technical base for scaling adaptable and efficient solutions.

fullstack.title: Angular & Spring Boot: Full Stack
fullstack.description: Angular 17 (components, routes, services, Redux) | Spring Boot 3 (Spring Security, JWT, JPA/Hibernate) | Implementation of solutions like real-time chat (WebSocket) | Shopping carts and CRUD with RESTful APIs | Integrating pagination and advanced state management | Deployment on AWS (EC2, RDS, S3) following optimal security and performance practices.

mobile.title: Flutter Django MySQL
mobile.description: Flutter | Django | MySQL | Google Maps | Clean Architecture | BLoC | Dependency Injection | Socket IO | Notifications
